K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-1: a'a rya r'ashta p'a la pa ri pri tstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-3: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-8: byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-10: bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-12: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-15: spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:458b-16: mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-2: dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-12: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-18: 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-19: bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-20: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-21: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-24: lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-25: lha'i dbang bo thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-29: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459a-30: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-0: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa @459b thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-1: 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i sengge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-3: lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-5: nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-7: zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-9: tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-15: sengge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-17: me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-19: lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas don shin tu rnam par nges pas chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:459b-20: sems can thams cad kyi go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-7: yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das sengge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-9: nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas shin tu lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-12: dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-13: lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-14: klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-15: 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-16: zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-17: rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa; ;lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-18: thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460a-19: 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-0: tshangs pa'i gnas @460b la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-1: tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-2: bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-3: sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal; ;brgya phyin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-4: gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-5: mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-6: thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-7: gling bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-8: 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-9: 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa rab mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-10: thugs rjes dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-11: mkha' la nyi ma lham me thal le ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-12: nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-13: nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-14: sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-15: dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-16: shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-17: rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-18: kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-19: ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-20: mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-21: gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-22: drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-23: sengge ri sul brten pa'i sgra sgrog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:460b-24: sa la ri dvags tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-0: mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung @461a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-2: pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-3: nor bu'i rgyal po bzang ba gzi brjid 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-4: nor bu thams cad zil mnan lham me ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-5: rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-6: 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lham mer bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-7: 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-8: lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-9: bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-10: yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-11: mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lham me ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-12: mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-13: gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-14: rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-15: yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-16: grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-17: bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dis thob des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-18: 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te mig gnyis mi 'dzum par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-0: @461b blta; chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-5: khong du chud par dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-7: rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-8: zhi ba dang phra ba la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-10: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-14: sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha' spyod yul du ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-22: chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-24: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:461b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-0: @462a *// sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-4: chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa dpyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-5: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-6: de zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-7: gsar bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-8: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-9: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-0: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te tshigs su @462b bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-1: mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-2: nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-3: rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-4: srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-5: zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-6: 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-7: rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-8: yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-9: bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-10: thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-11: de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-12: yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-13: byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-14: khyed kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-15: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-16: sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-17: 'dren pa khyod kyi sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-18: bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-19: shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-20: des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-21: rdzu 'phrul rkang dag mngon shes mchog la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-22: dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-23: sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:462b-24: mnyam med ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-1: ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-2: spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-3: tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-4: de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-6: gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-7: gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-8: 'gro bas legs bgyis pa dang nongs bgyis mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-9: 'gro la phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-10: de ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-11: gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-12: bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-13: dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-14: byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang nyan thos dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-15: drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-16: rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-17: mya ngan 'das ni chos gnas ci 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-18: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-19: der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-20: de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-21: dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-22: ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463a-23: chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-0: phyag 'tshal rgyal ba @463b ye shes mtsho khyod la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-1: khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-2: skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-3: mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-4: mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-5: gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-6: lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-7: tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-8: khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-9: khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-10: dbu snum 'jam zhing g-yas su 'khyil bar gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-11: lhun po'i rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-12: bsod nams rgya cher byung ba lham mer bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-13: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-14: khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-15: 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-16: spyan ni autpal 'dra zhing yid du mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-17: zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-18: rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lham me ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-19: lha pa'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-20: zhal bzang mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-21: ngan pa rma bya ri dvags rgyal gyi stabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-22: glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-23: sa rnams g-yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:463b-24: stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-0: phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum @464a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-2: sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-3: bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing sleb //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-4: sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-5: 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-6: sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-7: zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-8: mi rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-9: chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-10: chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-11: chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-12: 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-13: byams pa'i go che dran pa'i ral gri mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-14: tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-15: de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-16: nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-17: brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-18: grol nas 'ching pa las ni 'gro ba 'grel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-19: bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-20: bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-21: gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-22: 'phral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464a-23: gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-0: thugs rjes brnyes nas khyed kyis bstan pa @464b mdzad; ;chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-1: thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-2: bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-3: 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-5: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skyabs phye na; bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-9: khyod ci dad ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-10: ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:464b-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-0: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis @465a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-1: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-4: chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-5: gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-7: spobs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-10: sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-14: sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-15: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-16: ldem po dag yang dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-17: sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-18: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-19: zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-21: myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465a-24: yang dag nyid du ji ltar nges 'byung dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-0: ye shes @465b rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-1: mi mchog rgyal ba bdag la bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-2: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-3: sems can dam pa bsod nams tshogs bsags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-4: khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-5: byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-6: gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-7: ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-8: gang gis skye bo'i dogs pa gcod 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-9: shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-10: 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-11: 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen pa blta bgyid kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-12: skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-13: de dag don dge bsten par 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-14: dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-15: tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-16: sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-17: byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-18: bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-19: sred pa skem pa rnam grol reg mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-20: chos kyi tshul yang bskyud par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-21: sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:465b-22: gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-1: gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-2: bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-3: sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-4: ka la pingka'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-5: tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-6: chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-7: gtso bo bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-8: byang chub dam pa'i mchog la 'dun pa mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-9: chos dang 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-10: 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-11: rin chen dam pa bsgrag pa'i dus la bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-12: thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-13: bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-14: rgyal ba co 'dri ma lags don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-15: spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-21: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-23: khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466a-24: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @466b chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-3: khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-7: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-11: yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-14: bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-15: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-16: stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-17: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-20: yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-24: bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-25: byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-26: g-yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:466b-27: ye shes mtha' med ldan la de dag yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-0: skye dang nga dang rga dang @467a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-2: sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-3: srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-4: de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-5: nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-6: bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-7: 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes; ;gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-8: stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-9: bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-10: 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-11: byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-12: mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-13: de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-14: dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-15: rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-21: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-22: chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-23: tshul khrims yongs su dag par spyod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-0: chos nyid @467b yin te; de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-1: gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-2: gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-3: nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-4: de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-5: byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-6: de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-7: de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la brten pa ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-8: tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar ring du rnam par spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-9: dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-10: de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-11: de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-12: sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-15: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:467b-18: sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-0: rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa' @468a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-1: 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-3: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-5: dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-12: gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-13: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-14: byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can dgrol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-15: dga' zhing gus par gnas na de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-16: 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-17: thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-18: dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468a-19: 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-0: de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs @468b gtang rtag tu kun 'dzin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-1: slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-2: grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-3: thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-5: byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-8: byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-10: byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la blta bar mi bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-12: byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-14: byang chub sems dpas lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-15: srog la blta bar mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-17: byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-21: skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-22: yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:468b-23: de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-0: bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la @469a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-2: de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mi thob yid zhum med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-3: 'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-4: sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-5: sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-6: lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-7: bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-8: lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid res phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469a-15: tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-0: 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams @469b kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-2: mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-9: sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-10: tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-11: de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-12: tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-13: de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-14: de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-16: 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-17: 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g-yo med tshul 'chos med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-18: bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-19: thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-21: skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-22: 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:469b-23: zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-1: mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-2: 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyams pas skyabs mgon dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-3: dpung gnyer byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-4: bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-5: de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam gdab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-7: byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-8: cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-15: de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-17: de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-19: byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470a-20: cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-1: rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-2: de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-3: bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-4: rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-5: grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-6: lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-8: dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-9: sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-10: de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-11: de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-12: sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'gro la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:470b-22: nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul ba mi tshol ba ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471a-1: so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471a-12: lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471a-27: sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471b-1: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471b-2: 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma ltar bur rtog /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471b-5: ci nas byang chub lam ni grub byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471b-6: de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:471b-11: gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-1: 'dod chags bral ba'i bdud rtsi mthun spong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-2: de dag dper na ngan skyug ji bzhin spang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-3: gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-4: zang zing dag dang chos gos ltung bzed chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-5: rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-6: de dag rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-7: de dag me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-8: gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-9: 'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-10: de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-11: des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-12: gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-13: de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-14: grags dang mtshang 'dru phrag dog nga spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-15: sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-21: shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:473b-23: phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-1: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-3: yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-4: bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-9: gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-11: de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-12: des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-13: yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-14: shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-15: gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-16: bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-17: sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min la; ;chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-18: bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-19: sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-20: de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-21: las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-22: dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474a-23: yi dvags 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-0: gang zhig 'jig rten @474b sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-1: mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-2: de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-3: byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-8: pha rol la brnyes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-9: 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-10: mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-11: kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-12: ye shes dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-13: bag med pa la brten par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-14: phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-19: rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-20: rtag tu 'jig rten pa yis bsam gtan sgom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-21: ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-22: glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-23: khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:474b-24: gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-1: shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-2: mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-3: gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa 'di dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-4: skye rga na 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-5: brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-6: byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-7: sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-8: bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-9: sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-10: brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-11: pha rol phyin drug sa dang yon tan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-12: stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-13: yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-14: 'gro ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-15: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyad tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-16: sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-17: sbyin dang dul dang de la rtag tu spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-18: gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur; ;bas mtha'i nags su rtag par nga dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-19: byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-20: brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-21: skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-22: srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-23: sems can 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475a-24: sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-0: 'gro ba'i @475b don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-1: bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-2: rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-3: phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-4: grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-5: me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-6: nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-7: sum mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-8: de tshe nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-9: nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-10: thub pas bla ma rgos pa gso ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-11: mi yi dbang pos sra ba'i mdas bsnan kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-12: yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-13: legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g-yang sa nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-14: lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-15: nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-16: lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-17: stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-18: lus btang nas ni stag mi tshim par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-19: nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-20: skyes chen brtson 'grus bstan pa legs zhes bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-21: gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-22: sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-23: rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni; ;nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-24: rgyal bo zla nga'i bu zhes byar gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:475b-25: brjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-0: nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po @476a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-1: brgya; ;bsad par byas pa myur du thar par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-2: dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-3: nga yis phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te; ;nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-4: de tshe nga ni kun spyin rgyal por gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-5: nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-6: skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni; ;rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-7: rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-8: rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-9: sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-10: mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-11: srog btang nas ni de dag gzhan la byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-12: 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na; ;rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes byar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-13: chung ma ma dris khyo las mi 'phyo ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-14: bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-15: gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes byar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-16: nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-17: bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-18: nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-19: rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-20: nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476a-21: mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-0: stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la @476b mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-1: nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-2: mi bzad mig can khros par gyur na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-3: de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-4: de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin; ;nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-5: grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-6: thams cad du yang rgya cher sman gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-7: de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-8: srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-9: nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-10: bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-11: lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-12: gang tshe nga sngon mi yi rgyal po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-13: rin chen gtsug phud gyur tshe me tog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-14: spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-15: cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-16: nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-17: shing bal 'dab ma 'jam pa lta bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-18: padma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-19: lag ba rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-20: ded dpon sengge 'dzin du gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-21: snying rje med cing mi bzad rab gtum pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-22: srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-23: rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-24: gang tshe mig bzang zhes byar gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-25: byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:476b-26: srin mo dag la na chung 'du shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-1: lnga brgya de dag thar par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-2: gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-3: lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-4: bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-5: rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-6: sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-7: dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-8: rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-9: sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-10: rgyal po autpal mig ces byar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-11: padma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-12: yid du 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-13: 'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-14: sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-15: sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-16: bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-17: ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-18: sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-19: nad kyis btab pa nad pa'i mi mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-20: nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-21: mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-22: rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-23: nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-24: nad kyis rid par gyur la rkang byin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-25: ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-26: rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477a-27: rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-0: phangs shing yid @477b du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-1: phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-2: rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-3: byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-4: 'khor lo'i mtshan can padma lta bu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-5: lag pa phrugs kyang mi blta rab tu byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-6: rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-7: snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-8: skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-9: gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-10: rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-11: 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-12: dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-13: rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-14: bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-15: bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-16: gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-17: nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-18: rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-19: shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-20: rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-21: gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-22: rgyal po byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-23: rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-24: rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-25: 'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:477b-26: srog chags go dhar sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-0: grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs @478a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-1: nas; ;lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-2: de tshe nga yi sems ni g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-3: spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-4: rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-5: nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-6: nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-7: skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-8: snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-9: gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-10: spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-11: rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-12: glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-13: shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-14: de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-15: bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-16: nga yis zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i mi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-17: de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-18: ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-19: kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-20: byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-21: dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-22: mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-23: dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-24: sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-25: mthong ba tsam gyis me de zhi gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-26: lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-27: ri dvags gyur tshe gangg'a'i rlabs shugs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-28: khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-29: de yis gsod phyir nga gan khrid de 'ongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478a-30: 'on kyang nga ni de la yid ma khros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-0: rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te @478b mgon med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-1: tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-2: bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-3: rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-4: nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-5: sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-6: sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-7: srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-8: srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-9: nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-10: lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-11: sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-12: ri dvags rgyal po sengger gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-13: mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-14: mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-15: de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas; ;dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-16: nga sngon rgya mtsho'i dogs su gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-17: srin mo'i nang du song ba'i tshong pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-18: nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-19: 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-20: 'dab chags kun lar ni nga gyur tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-21: 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-22: bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-23: gel ba'i nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-24: legs spyad ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:478b-25: thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-0: de yi ched du ngas ni lus kyang @479a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-2: sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-3: sdong po bskams kyang ngas ni de ma btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-4: de tshe brgya byin byas gzos sang mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-5: sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-6: nga ni spra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-7: mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-8: spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-9: rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-10: nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-11: s'a lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-12: ne tso ci phyir nga yi s'a lu len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-13: lo tog smin 'di ma rungs byar sems sam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-14: ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-15: bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-16: pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-17: de la snying rjes bdag gis s'a lu blangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-18: gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'dabs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-19: 'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-20: de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-21: des na bdag ni rku ba gzhar mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-22: ne tso legs so s'a lu ci dgar khyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-23: sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-24: khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dud 'gro yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-25: legs so khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-26: byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-27: sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479a-28: spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-0: nga yi yid ni @479b skyo bar gyur pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-1: nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-2: nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-3: tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-4: bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-5: sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-6: de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-7: bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-8: ngas ni de tshe lus ni bskams bar byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-9: gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-10: sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-11: sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-12: sngon spyad tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-13: spyod pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-14: brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-15: spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-16: tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-17: 'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-18: bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-19: de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-20: rtag tu gnyid non khab ltar g-yo ngan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-21: rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-22: bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-23: zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-24: 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-25: nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-26: mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-27: de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:479b-28: sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-2: bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-3: des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-4: 'di lam 'jug pa 'di ni nor ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-5: gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-6: rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-7: tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-8: gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-9: gal te rdeg pa chen po yod na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-10: 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-11: gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-12: de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-13: sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-14: rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-15: dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-16: tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-17: ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-18: khva ltar spyi rtol che la rgod gtum zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-19: phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-20: dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-21: lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-22: chos gos gra rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-23: chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-24: grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-25: de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480a-26: khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-0: bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs @480b nas; ;de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig 'khyer bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-1: de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-2: de dag phyugs dang bran mo bran pho bsrel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-3: zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-4: brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-5: de dag 'phags min tshigs kyang mi smra med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-6: bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-7: de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-8: dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-9: dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-10: de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-11: tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-12: bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-13: rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-14: khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-15: khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-16: bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-17: gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-18: lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-19: de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-20: nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-21: 'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-22: dud 'gro yi dvags dmyal bar lhung byed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-23: de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-24: de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-25: ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-26: de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:480b-27: kha zas dag kyang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-1: dag nyin dang mtshan du bgro bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-2: bstan pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-3: de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-4: 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-5: rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-6: de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-7: bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-8: slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-9: rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-10: de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-11: lus la sha kra can dang gzugs mi sdug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-12: rtag tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-13: 'ongs shing lhag pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-14: lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-15: de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-16: de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-17: de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-18: de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-19: 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-20: de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-21: lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-22: de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-23: sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-24: nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-25: de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481a-26: de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-0: bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs @481b kyang brjed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-1: rgyags dang nga rgyal grags pa yongs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-2: de dag mi zad mnar med lhung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-3: de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-4: kun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rtag tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-5: nye du bsten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-6: de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-7: bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-8: rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-9: gnas la bkram zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-10: de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-11: nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-12: bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-13: dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-14: gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-15: gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-16: chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-17: dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-18: de dag rnams ni sdug par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-19: 'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-20: 'di ni nga yi lhan gcig gnas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-21: 'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-22: khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-23: 'di ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-24: mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-25: 'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-26: 'dir ni ci zhig spyod kyi dge slong song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:481b-27: de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-2: de dag khyim pa lta bur gsog 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-3: 'tshog chas rnams dang g-yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-4: phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-5: kun tu smad pa byas par gyur pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-6: de dag nga yi tshig ni dran 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-7: bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-8: kye hud rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-9: dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-10: rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-11: ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-12: phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-13: rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-14: de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-15: spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-16: 'byed dang zur zer 'thab mo dga' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-17: yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-18: de dag skye ba'i ston par grags gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-19: de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-20: 'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-21: yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-22: 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-23: rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-24: ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas bsubs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482a-25: padma'i rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-0: rin chen mchod sdong chag par @482b gnas pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-1: phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-2: phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-3: rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-4: dge slong dul pa ma yin de 'dra ba; ;de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-5: spyod pa 'di la brten par dga' ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-6: de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-7: 'di nas shi 'phos yi dvags 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-8: dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-9: lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-10: mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-11: ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang; ;rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-12: sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di dag rtag bsten pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-13: long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-14: lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-15: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-16: gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-17: de dag su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-18: de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-19: de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-20: de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-21: mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-22: bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-23: yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-24: sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:482b-25: nges pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod bor la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-1: pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-2: 'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur te re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-3: gang zhig sangs rgyas tshogs dang 'phags tshogs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-4: bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-5: gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-6: de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-7: 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-8: 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-9: sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-10: 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-11: pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-12: rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-13: ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-14: de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-15: gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-19: mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-20: g-yo dang ldan pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-21: g-yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-23: mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-24: zang zing la dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-26: khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483a-28: bya khva ltar mu cor smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-1: phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-2: rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-3: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-4: sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-5: de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-6: dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-7: ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhe sa med par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-9: gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-13: phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba skyed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang; rang dgar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-14: shar gnyer ba dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-15: gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-16: rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur; yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-17: chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-18: mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur; de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:483b-19: de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-0: @484a *// ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-1: de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-2: zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te /
