K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-5: gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-7: de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-8: byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-10: gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-12: ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-13: mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-14: dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-15: rigs dma' bar skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-16: mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-17: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-19: ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-21: chos brgyad po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-22: byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-25: tshig gis khas 'che ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-26: tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484a-27: g-yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-0: zang zing lhur @484b len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-1: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-2: shes rab 'chal pa la the tshom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-3: ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-4: mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-5: yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-6: khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-7: spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-8: khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-9: ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-10: tshod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-11: lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-13: ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-15: gzhan du smra la gzhan du byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-16: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-18: yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-19: ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:484b-20: nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-1: dag la byang chub mchog rab ring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-2: chags bas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-3: le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-4: dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-5: tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-6: dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-7: mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol par gyur; ;de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-8: gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-9: rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-10: der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-11: mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-12: bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-13: rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-14: mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-15: dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-16: mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-17: de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-18: bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-19: g-yang sa chen po mi bzad lhung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-20: de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-21: gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-22: de phyir lhas sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-23: rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485a-24: chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-0: bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung mar @485b chags; ;tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-1: byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-2: de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-3: byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-4: dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-5: de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-6: nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-7: byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-8: nga yi rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-9: chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-10: don med gyur nas bstan las lhung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-11: nga ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-12: g-yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-13: de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-14: thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-15: bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-16: de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-17: chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-18: dper na long ba lam sel med dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-20: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:485b-24: dpag tu med pa; tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-3: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-8: 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-12: rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya pa shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-13: lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-14: rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir ra ba rim pa bdun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-15: mig mang ris su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-16: de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-17: lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-19: rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486a-22: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-0: de btsas ma thag tu rin @486b po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-1: rgyal po'i khang bzang gi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gter gyi mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te yul 'khor skyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-2: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-3: sems can gang dag brtson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang brtson ra nas thar par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-5: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-7: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-8: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-9: khyod bag yod par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-10: mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-15: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-17: de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so; ;gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-18: bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:486b-19: bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-0: bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams @487a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-2: nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-3: legs sdom dga' la ser sna byed pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-4: sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-5: de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-6: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-7: 'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-8: de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-9: bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-10: gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-11: bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang; ;byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-12: rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna ba sna //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-13: slong ba rnams la rab tu dgos byin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-14: byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-15: de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-16: rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-17: nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-18: 'dus byas gang la blta dang sgyu ma 'dras; ;'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-19: srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g-yo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-20: 'dzim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-21: brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-22: gzhon nu 'di lta rtag med dge ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-23: ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487a-24: pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-0: de yis dge dang mi dge gang byas @487b ba; ;de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-1: 'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-2: don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-3: khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-4: don med nyid du ngal ba bsten par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-5: da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-6: mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-7: rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-8: da lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-9: bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-10: zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-11: bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-12: sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-13: bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs brten cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-14: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-15: de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-16: lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-17: brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-18: lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnams spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-19: rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par; ;sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-20: sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-21: kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-22: tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'; ;khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-23: dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:487b-24: pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-0: skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs @488a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-1: la; ;lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-2: bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-4: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-5: gnyid kyis non par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-6: nam yang rgod par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-7: rtses par ma gyur; dga' ba byed par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-8: yongs su spyad par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-9: nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-10: nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-11: nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-15: grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-16: de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-17: nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-20: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-21: sdug pa dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-23: 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-24: rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-25: srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488a-26: so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-0: byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang @488b na gnas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-1: bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-2: snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-3: bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig bu gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-5: de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-6: lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-7: rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-8: mu tig gi dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-9: rin po che'i srog shing bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-10: lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-11: rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-12: rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-13: de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-16: rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-17: lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-18: gar mkhas pa; dbang po dar la bab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:488b-19: skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-0: de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin mtshan @489a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-3: rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-4: ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-5: sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-6: ces bsgo'o; ;lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-8: btung ba 'dod par nams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-10: bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-34: skye bo thams cad kyi yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-35: de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-36: rin po che na bdun mig mang ris su bris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-37: rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489a-38: de'i nang du khang bzang zhig byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-0: der gzhon @489b nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-1: de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-2: 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang; rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-4: skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-9: gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i sengge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-10: rdzing de'i sengge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-13: padma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-14: khor yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-15: dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-16: 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-17: rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgyad bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-18: rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sprel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-19: de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bsgul na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-22: rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:489b-23: gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-1: steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-2: de'i tshe khang bzang der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-3: khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-4: gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba khrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-5: khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas aa ga rus bdugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-6: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grem par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-7: gser gyi lda ldi bres so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-8: gser gyi padma rab tu dpyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-9: mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas bres so; ;nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-10: rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-11: rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya dpyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-12: skyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-13: de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to; ;yul 'khor skyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490a-14: skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-3: de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-4: gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya ba'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-5: de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nyi shu lon pa'i shed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-6: thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-7: las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-8: thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-9: 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-10: pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-11: nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-12: grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-13: rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-14: de dag thams cad gzugs bzang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-16: blta na sdug pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-17: thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:490b-21: skyes bu'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-0: sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya @491a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-2: ha cang yang mi ring ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-3: ha cang yang mi thung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-4: ha cang yang mi skem pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-5: ha cang yang mi sbom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-6: ha cang yang mi dkar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-7: ha cang yang mi sngo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-8: kha nas me tog autpa la'i bsung 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-9: lus rnams las tsandan gyi dri 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-10: lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-11: shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-12: glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-13: glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-14: bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-19: gsad par bya ba'i mis gshed ma mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-20: ngo mtshar gyi sems mi bskyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-22: grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan gcig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491a-23: lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnams pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-0: bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs @491b kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-1: de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-4: reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-5: de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-14: de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-15: de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-16: bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-17: nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-18: su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-19: de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-20: khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-21: lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-22: 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-23: brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-24: padma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-25: lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:491b-26: mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-1: rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-2: de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-3: glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-4: khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-5: padma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-6: me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-7: sna tshogs stong bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-8: soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-9: dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi deng 'dir bu dga' gyis; ;khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-10: autpa la dang padma dag gi tshal gyis gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-11: padma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-12: de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-13: ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-14: ka la pingka shang shang te'u dang kun la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-15: yid 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos ngad ldang 'dra ba; ;thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-16: gzhal med khang dag mu tig dra ra bcas nor bu btsugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-17: gser dang bee d'urya spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra; ;rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492a-18: gser dril g-yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-0: zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags @492b pa; ;khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-1: bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-2: dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-3: mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-4: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-5: gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-6: bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-7: khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-8: skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-9: 'dus byas yid byung dor ba'i longs spyod don mi gnyer; ;yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-10: 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-11: thar pa don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-12: lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-13: bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-14: nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g-yang sar lhung byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-15: sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-16: mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-17: bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g-yang sa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-18: rtag tu 'phags ba'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-19: sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:492b-20: bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-2: khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-3: gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi;; glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-4: dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-5: kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brlag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-6: ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-7: shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-8: dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-9: mi rtag 'di yis dpa' rnams thams cad bshig gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-10: srog g-yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-11: sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-12: srid par rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-13: 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-14: 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-15: rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-16: gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-17: bdag cag thams cad rtsva rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-18: sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-19: mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-20: srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493a-21: 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-0: rgyal po mkhas la @493b srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-1: lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-2: byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-3: 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-4: rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-5: rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g-yen spyo sems 'khol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-6: de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-7: 'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-8: skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-9: khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-10: zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-11: rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-12: chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-13: rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-14: 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-15: rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-16: gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-17: zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-18: bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-19: stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-20: legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:493b-21: ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-0: long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i @494a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-2: rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-3: de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-4: byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-5: sems can bde 'brug lha mthong glog gi phreng ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-6: byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-7: 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-8: rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-9: bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-10: byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-11: gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-12: rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-13: blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-14: mi dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g-yang sar ltung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-15: byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-16: 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro dag ni rgyun zlog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-17: rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-18: lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong spro yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-19: bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-20: rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer thabs cig myur du bzhud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494a-21: yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-0: gang bdag bsam pa @494b ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-1: yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-2: bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-3: grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-4: dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-5: bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-7: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzang gi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-16: khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-18: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-20: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:494b-21: lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-0: gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar @495a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-1: bgyi; ;su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-2: tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-4: de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-5: gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-6: don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-7: de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-8: de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam gtan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-9: bsod nams 'od zer gyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-10: bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-11: de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-12: ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-13: byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-14: de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-15: de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-16: dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g-yas su 'khyil pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-17: de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-18: nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g-yas su 'khyil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-19: spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang autpal sngon po 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-20: mi dbang sengge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495a-21: sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-0: @495b stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skem //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-1: de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-2: bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-3: rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-4: de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-5: rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-6: shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-7: tshangs dbyangs shin tu snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-8: yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-9: rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-10: yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-11: chos kyi phreng pa yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-12: sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba; ;mi ci ka la pingka khu byug ngur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-13: rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku na la yi sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-14: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-15: ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-16: rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-17: skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-18: gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-19: chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:495b-20: ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-0: dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun @496a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-2: phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-3: rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma gser gyi mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-4: ba spu g-yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-5: lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-6: rang byung ae na ya yi byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-7: zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-8: glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs sengge'i rtsal gyi stobs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-9: khyu mchog 'gying pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod stong rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-10: mkha' las me tog char 'bab me tog gdugs su gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-11: gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-12: rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-13: grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-14: padma chus ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-15: mi yi sengge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-17: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-19: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste; dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-20: bde ba skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496a-22: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci @496b 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-1: de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-2: des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-3: de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-4: ji ltar 'khor ba ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-5: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-6: ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-7: ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-8: ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-9: ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-10: ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-11: ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-12: ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-13: ji ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-14: ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-15: ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-16: ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-17: ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-18: ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-19: ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-20: ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-21: ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-22: ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-23: ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-24: ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:496b-25: ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-0: ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub @497a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-1: pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-2: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-3: 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa'i rmongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-4: sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-6: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-7: 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-8: skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-9: bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par spyad par mi nus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-11: de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-12: bdag sgo nas byung na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-13: nye du'i tshogs kyi bar chad byas su 'ong gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-14: bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-17: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-18: khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub @497b blos phyag g-yas pa brkyangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-1: 'od phyung nas 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-2: 'od de las kyang padma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-3: padma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-5: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer padma de la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-6: zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-9: gzhon nu de sdong bu bcad pa sgyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-12: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-13: bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-14: chegs [?] chen sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:497b-15: ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-1: gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-2: 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-3: mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-4: thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-5: mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-6: lam mnyam pa la de ring ston gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-7: ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-8: dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-9: g-yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-10: dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-11: mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng grol mdzod; ;som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-12: byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-13: chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-14: mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-15: rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-16: sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-17: khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-18: srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-19: yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-20: mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-21: srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-22: dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste; ;bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-23: bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed gcig nges gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498a-24: byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-0: ji ltar byang chub @498b spyod pa mchog spyad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-1: 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-2: 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-5: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-6: mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-7: de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-11: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-12: mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-13: gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-14: rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-15: mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-16: rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-17: khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-18: gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-19: thub pa khyod ni smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:498b-20: kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-2: spyan mchog bzang po autpal sngon po 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-3: rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-4: ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-5: de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-6: chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-7: 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-8: tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-9: bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-10: 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-11: bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo; ;rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-12: 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-13: 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-14: bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du rlag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-15: ae na'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-16: glang po'i rgyal po rma bya sengge'i stabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-17: bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-18: sa dang ri dang dam pa g-yo bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-19: bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-20: khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-21: 'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-22: khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-23: khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499a-24: khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-0: sems can @499b kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-1: mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-2: khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-3: khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-4: khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-5: mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-6: khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-7: khyod ni sengge lta bur 'khor du sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-8: khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-9: mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-10: thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-11: padma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-12: khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la pingka'i skad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-13: srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-14: khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-15: gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-16: bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-17: chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-18: stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-19: mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-20: thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-21: de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-22: 'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-23: skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-24: bder gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-25: bla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-26: skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:499b-27: sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-2: thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-3: dud 'gro yid dvags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-4: 'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-5: glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-6: de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-7: gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-8: 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-9: chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-10: rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-11: 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-12: tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-13: dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-14: sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsungs pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-15: bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-16: yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-17: de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-18: theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-19: khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-20: rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-21: mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-22: phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-23: mtshungs med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-24: gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-25: 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500a-26: rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-0: rgyal @500b ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-1: tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-2: yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-3: gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-4: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-5: mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-6: thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-7: gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-8: bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-9: 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-10: bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-11: bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-12: bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-13: bsod nams bgyid pa rtag tu mi bas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-14: byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni; ;bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-15: gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-16: yongs su dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-17: dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis; ;sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-18: rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-19: yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-20: mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-21: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-22: khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:500b-23: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-2: bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-3: rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-4: mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-5: bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi bgyid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-6: mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-7: bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-8: mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-9: dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-10: dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par 'byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-11: lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-12: yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-13: bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-14: 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-16: de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-17: rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi khor du ba'i sgra thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-18: thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501a-21: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-0: de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu @501b zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-2: de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-10: de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-11: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-14: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-15: srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-16: sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-17: skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-18: yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:501b-19: rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-1: gis spras ltar yongs su dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-2: rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-3: blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo; ;bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-4: bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-5: sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-6: des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-7: sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-8: bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-9: khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-10: chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-11: 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-12: chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-13: rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-14: bder gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-15: khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-16: 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-17: dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-18: thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502a-19: bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltams par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-0: sa @502b dga' dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-1: nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-2: 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon zhes gsung yang phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-3: thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-4: yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-5: bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-6: kha cig tu ni bud med nang na zhugs par gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-7: yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-8: gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-9: sems can dam pa bye ba brgya yis yongs bskor nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-10: nags gnas gnas gcig pu nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-11: khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-12: zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-13: sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-14: khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-15: rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-16: mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-17: rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-18: khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-19: khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:502b-20: thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-2: kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-3: chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-4: sems can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-5: thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-6: sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-7: 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-8: lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod kyis legs gsungs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-9: bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-10: mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-11: mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-12: srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-13: bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-14: 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-0: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la @503b 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-1: bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-4: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis pha ma de gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-6: bud med de dag la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-7: khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-8: ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-9: de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-11: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-12: ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-13: dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g-yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-14: steng du rin po che'i dra bas bla re bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:503b-15: g-yas g-yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-1: padma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-2: ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-3: dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang spyin pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-4: phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-5: nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-6: gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-7: de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-8: bdag la dga' ba ma byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-9: sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-10: bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-11: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-12: 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-13: rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-14: lus dang srog la yang mi lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-15: dngos po gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-16: bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gnyis su ma zhus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-18: bar skabs der khrus ma byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-19: mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus la ma bskus /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-21: ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504a-23: bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-0: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das @504b pa de'i tshe tsandan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-1: gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-4: rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur ba nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsags te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-5: mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g-yogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-6: mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so; ;mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-7: mchod rten de dag thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-8: 'dzam bu'i gling khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-9: mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong las mar me bus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-10: mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-13: byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-14: tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-16: de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-17: rtag tu tsog bu pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:504b-18: nam yang glos ma phab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-1: rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-2: de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-3: de gzhan la tha na legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-4: zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-5: rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-6: de chos nyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-7: de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-8: yul 'khor gyi mi thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-11: grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslab ste rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-13: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-14: bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob pa'i yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-15: bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-16: dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-19: dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505a-20: tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-0: @505b de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-1: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-5: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-7: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-8: grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-13: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-14: bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:505b-15: ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-4: tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-5: shes kyi khe la chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-6: nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-7: 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-8: 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-9: rab tu byung ba don med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-10: dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-11: byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-17: rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-21: na ba'i ched kyi sman dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-22: yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-23: ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-26: dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-27: spyod yul dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-28: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-29: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-30: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-33: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang mi bsten par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506a-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-0: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod @506b pa dpag med na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-1: snying ni thob dang shes kyi khe la song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-2: byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs por nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-3: de dag thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-4: khva 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral; ;shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-5: nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-6: bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-7: lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du; ;thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-8: gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-9: de 'dra de dag sprul ltar ring du spang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-10: de dag sangs rgyas chos dang ji bzhin du; ;dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-11: mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-12: sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-13: nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-14: yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-15: bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-16: de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid ston pa 'dir brtson gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-17: gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-18: de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-19: bsam ste yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-20: de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:506b-21: yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-1: 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-2: bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-3: byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-4: 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-5: der gnas nas ni bdag mi snyems shing gzhan mi smad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-6: sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mnyes ma byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-7: rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun du bdag la spyos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-8: lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-9: gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-10: nga yis mdo 'dir sgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-11: de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-12: gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-13: thos nas phyir zhing yid ni 'jug par bya ba'i rigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-14: de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-15: rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-17: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-18: yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-19: bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-20: snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrubs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507a-21: bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-0: bye @507b ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-8: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye rgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-9: dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-14: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-18: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-19: skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:507b-21: don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong @508a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-7: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-8: yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste; 'dus pa bco brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-12: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-004:508a-13: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa ///
